page.title: 06ICI Runcorn
page.content: Runcorn is the headquarters of ICI Mond Division and is the largest employer in the district.The main offices employing 2500 are at Runcorn Heath while a further 7500 are employed in the chemical works producing chlorine,solvents,aerosols, paints,plastics and fire extinguishers.The company offers all employees several sports and social clubs as well as both hospital and works centre medical care and pensions.The company is actively involved in school and community projects and fosters links with local bodies.
